basics.name: Ashutosh Somvanshi
basics.label: AI Engineer
basics.summary: AI/ML Engineer and Data Analyst with expertise in developing innovative solutions for tabular data analysis, invoice management systems, and Azure Cognitive Services integration. Passionate about leveraging cutting-edge technologies to drive efficiency and unlock valuable insights from complex datasets.

work.name: Freelance/Consulting
work.summary: Developing innovative solutions for tabular data analysis using GPT models and advanced preprocessing techniques. Creating advanced invoice management systems with OCR and pattern matching, achieving 95% accuracy in data extraction.
highlights: Developed GPT-based tabular data analysis system with 95% accuracy
Created intelligent invoice management platform with OCR integration
Leveraged Azure Cognitive Services for automated document processing
Achieved 70% time reduction in analytical report generation
Built scalable data processing pipelines for diverse business requirements

volunteer.summary: Contributing to open source AI projects and sharing knowledge about machine learning and data analysis techniques.
highlights: Contributing to AI/ML open source projects
Sharing knowledge and best practices in data science community

awards.title: High Accuracy Achievement in AI Data Analysis
awards.summary: Achieved 95% accuracy in AI-generated data insights and 70% time reduction in analytical report generation through innovative GPT-based solutions.

publications.name: Innovative Approaches to Tabular Data Analysis with GPT Models
publications.summary: Exploring innovative approaches to overcome challenges in GPT model applications for tabular data decision-making through advanced preprocessing and feature engineering.

projects.name: GPT-Based Tabular Data Analysis System
projects.summary: Revolutionary approach to tabular data decision-making using GPT models with advanced preprocessing and feature engineering. Achieved 95% accuracy in generating data-driven insights.
highlights: Natural language interaction with structured datasets

projects.name: Intelligent Invoice Management Platform
projects.summary: Advanced system for invoice classification, OCR processing, and automated data extraction with high accuracy rates in differentiating handwritten vs. machine-printed content.
highlights: Robust classification model for invoice types

projects.name: Azure Cognitive Services Integration
projects.summary: Developed intelligent document processing solutions using Form Recognizer and Vision AI for enhanced automation and data extraction from diverse forms and documents.
